entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:03 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:03 PM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
